title: TestCase
description: Test case is a test definition to capture data quality tests against tables, columns, and other data assets.

testCaseParameterValue.description: This schema defines the parameter values that can be passed for a Test Case.

name.description: name of the parameter. Must match the parameter names in testCaseParameterDefinition

value.description: value to be passed for the Parameters. These are input from Users. We capture this in string and convert during the runtime.

id.description: Unique identifier of this table instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this test case.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this test.

testDefinition.description: Test definition that this test case is based on.

entityLink.description: Link to the entity that this test case is testing.

testSuite.description: Basic Test Suite that this test case belongs to.

testSuites.description: Basic and Logical Test Suites this test case belongs to

testCaseResult.description: Latest test case result obtained for this test case.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

computePassedFailedRowCount.description: Compute the passed and failed row count for the test case.

incidentId.description: Reference to an ongoing Incident ID (stateId) for this test case.

failedRowsSample.description: Sample of failed rows for this test case.

inspectionQuery.description: SQL query to retrieve the failed rows for this test case.

domain.description: Domain the test case belongs to. When not set, the test case inherits the domain from the table it belongs to.

useDynamicAssertion.description: If the test definition supports it, use dynamic assertion to evaluate the test case.

tags.description: Tags for this test case. This is an inherited field from the parent entity and is not set directly on the test case.
